page.title: 01CALCOT & TILEHURST,READING
page.content: Calcot and Tilehurst are two areas to the west of Reading.They are largely residential in character. Housing,transport,and employment fascilities are good. The A4 Bath Rd runs through Calcot and connects with the M4,thus allowing easy access to the East and West. Bus services are frequent to Reading and Newbury.Buses also allow access to Tilehurst and Reading railway stations Buses leave regularly from Reading station,taking passengers to Heathrow airport. Shopping fascilities are excellently catered for by the large Savacentre hypermarket situated in Calcot. Sports and recreation are catered for by the Meadway Sports Centre in Tilehurst and the Central Swimming Pool in Reading.
